description: 24 processing figures, plus a woman carrying a child beneath corpse on a decorated stretcher, and a monkey; musicians with cymbals, drums and gongs at rear of procession; male figures all wear and brown skirts with yellow designs and wide waist sashes with white, black and pink checks; female figures wear green skirts with gold diamond designs and wide waist sashes of orange with black curved designs; all figures wear yellow headbands; body wrapped in multicolored striped cloth; black base
title: Funeral Procession
